Central processor complex hardware components 47 DIMM plugging for the configurations in each CPC drawer do not have to be similar. Each memory 8 slot DIMM bank must have the same DIMM size; however, a drawer can have a mix of DIMM banks. The support element View Hardware Configuration task can be used to determine the size and quantity of the memory plugged in each drawer. Figure 2-19 shows an example of an IBM z16 AGZ using drawer configuration number 30 from the previous tables, and displays some of the locations and descriptions of the installed memory modules.
